title: indicator
description: Indicators contain a pattern that can be used to detect suspicious or malicious cyber activity.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `indicator`.

indicator_types.description: This field is an Open Vocabulary that specifies the type of indicator. Open vocab - indicator-type-ov

name.description: The name used to identify the Indicator.

description.description: A description that provides the recipient with context about this Indicator potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

pattern.description: The detection pattern for this indicator.

pattern_type.description: The type of pattern used in this indicator.

pattern_version.description: The version of the pattern that is used.

valid_from.description: The time from which this indicator should be considered valuable intelligence.

valid_until.description: The time at which this indicator should no longer be considered valuable intelligence.

kill_chain_phases.description: The phases of the kill chain that this indicator detects.
